data.description:
Users are seeing ~10 second delays for common bead actions (create, bulk close, and other updates) with little/no immediate UI feedback until completion.

Repro examples:
1) Create a new beat -> click Done -> UI appears hung for ~10s.
2) Select 2 beats -> bulk close -> no visible feedback for ~10s before state updates.

Expected:
- Bead actions should complete quickly under normal conditions.
- If backend work takes longer, UI must provide immediate in-progress feedback.

Scope:
- Identify root cause(s) of latency across create/update/close paths.
- Instrument timings for API and bd command layers.
- Reduce end-to-end latency and/or improve progressive feedback where latency cannot be eliminated.
